name: Treasure Timer
description:
Treasure Timer

You are stuck in a dark labyrinth made of potentially murderous warrior statues. Your goal? Loot as much treasure as possible before the time is up, of course!

Luckily, someone is ready to aid with this worthy endeavour and grants you the ability to teleport.

This game was developed as a 48h game jam project in February 2023 using Unity.

How to play

Use WSAD to move the player character.

Use Q to set down the golden toad. Use Q again to return to it – save valuable time or escape precarious situations.

Collect the items. Rare items will net a higher score. 

The characters

    You: You just want those sweet, sweet riches, really.

    Time: A dragon god (?) wanting to be entertained. By you. No pressure or anything.

Golden Toad: A bringer of good fortune - hopefully to you.

       The warriors: They are, like most statues, standing around. Totally harmless – or are they?
